name: Meteors Attack
description:
Meteors are destroying your land. You need to destroy 50 meteors before they do.

WASD to move the character on the ground.

Space to jump. Hold space will make your jump higher.

To destroy the meteor, you need to dash through it by clicking left mouse button.

Once you have dashed, you are switched to fly mode in which only W will move forward with the direction of the mouse. Of course you can still dash while flying.

You can switch back on the ground by clicking right mouse button.

If you have fell down for whatever reason, don't worry, your position will be reset to the land.

This game is created in a very short period of time for a game jam.

mbrmj
